definition: having the lower score or lagging position in a contest, in or to or toward the rear, the fleshy part of the human body that you sit on
details:
adjective
- having the lower score or lagging position in a contest
adverb
- in or to or toward the rear
= example: in or to or toward the rear
- remaining in a place or condition that has been left or departed from
= example: remaining in a place or condition that has been left or departed from
- in debt or in need of repayment
= example: in debt or in need of repayment
= synonyms: behindhand, in arrears
- in or into an inferior position
= example: in or into an inferior position
- of timepieces
= synonyms: slow
noun
- the fleshy part of the human body that you sit on
= synonyms: tail
